content: Insurance Asked by AnonymousAsked on 13 Jul 2019What are the insurance plans available in the market for your parents?Recently, I discovered that my uncle has no insurance plans at all. He is around 64-66years old and has retired many years ago. Smoker for many years, and with diabetes, and possibly high blood pressure and cholesterol. Wonder if there are any plans in the market that are available for him with these health conditions? The priority is medical and hospitalization coverage.2 answersAnswerBump0
